name: nourdine ouakhroun
bio: I'm Nourdine Ouakhroun, a passionate software engineering student from Morocco, currently honing my skills at 1337 Coding School, part of the prestigious 42 Network.

I'm a 21-year-old full-stack software engineer with a deep interest in building efficient, scalable, and innovative solutions. My journey in software development has equipped me with a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies, allowing me to create impactful applications.

projects.name: Inception
description: A Docker-based project at 42, setting up WordPress, MariaDB, and Nginx.
Focuses on containerization, multi-service orchestration, and scalable web environments.
Focuses on containerization, multi-service orchestration, and scalable web environments.

projects.name: Transcendence
description: A full-stack web app project at 42, combining front-end and back-end skills.
Focuses on real-time features to enhance client-server integration and dynamic interactions.
Focuses on real-time features to enhance client-server integration and dynamic interactions.

projects.name: Portfolio
description: A personal project to showcase my skills and projects.
Focuses on responsive design, user experience, and visual appeal.
Focuses on responsive design, user experience, and visual appeal.

projects.name: WebServer
description: Build a basic HTTP server from scratch using C++.
Handle HTTP requests, manage c onnections, and implement socket programming.
Handle HTTP requests, manage connections, and implement socket programming.

projects.name: Cub3D
description: A 42 project that involves raycasting to create a 3D maze using the C language.
Focuses on graphics programming, optimization, and algorithmic thinking.
Focuses on graphics programming, optimization, and algorithmic thinking.

projects.name: Minishell
description: A 42 project that involves building a basic shell using C.
Focuses on parsing, executing commands, and managing processes.
Focuses on parsing, executing commands, and managing processes.
